text: John Benton is an American football coach who is currently the offensive line coach for the San Francisco 49ers of the National Football League (NFL), a position he has held since the 2017 season. ==College career== John attended Colorado State University (CSU), where he played offensive line for the Colorado State Rams football team. He earned honorable mention All-WAC honors during his junior and senior seasons and was named to the WAC’s All-Academic team as a senior. He was also named to the Colorado State University Football All Century Team for the years 1893-1993.http://www.jaguars.com/team/coaches/John- Benton/d38e5788-3c02-42d2-a781-e36f2dca2fbb ==Coaching career== John is the current offensive line coach for the San Francisco 49ers. ==References== ==External links== Category:Living people Category:Miami Dolphins coaches Category:Colorado State Rams football coaches Category:St. Louis Rams coaches Category:California Vulcans football coaches Category:Houston Texans coaches Category:Jacksonville Jaguars coaches Category:San Francisco 49ers coaches Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:National Football League replacement players
title: John Benton (American football)
